messages.long: Our shipboard computer has gone haywire!  We can't reboot it!  Please help!
We are holding this ship hostage!  Bring us 900 energy, and no tricks, or we blow this ship into dust!!
We have commandeered this ship!  Make no attempt to stop us.  If we see you approach, we will blow this ship into dust!!
Our sensors are all down!  We're flying blind.  Please guide us to a station for repairs!
We're dead in space, our docking ports are destroyed, and our ambassador needs to be rescued.  Can you collect him in your shuttle?
We're dead in space, our docking ports are destroyed, and the big boss needs to be elsewhere.  Can you collect him in your shuttle?
We are carrying needed supplies to the station.  Please clear our way.
Hail, Bold Privateer!  We're carrying... questionable... cargo to the station.  If you can keep friendly ships from coming closer than 10,000 meters, we'll reward you when we reach dock.
We are carrying secret, secure data for your government.
Pirate scum!  We're carrying critical data that cannot get into the hands of filthy pirates like you!  Come within 10,000 meters and we'll destroy ourselves!  You are warned.
Our engines are damaged and we can't move!  Could you spare a DamCon team to help us?
We're out of energy!  Could you lend us 100 units to get moving?
We're just moving cargo between the stations in this sector.  That's all.  How are you?
We're broken down!  Out of energy!  Yeah!  Could you come help us?
We're studying the amazing local phenomenon in this sector.
We're travelling this sector, showing our guests the most beautiful and amazing sights.
We're moving cargo between the stations in this sector.
Patrolling this sector.  Standing by to assist.
We're leaving this sector as fast as we can.  Thanks again for your help!
We are currently engaging A23.
We are currently moving to DS1.

ignored.long: We appreciate your help.  We'll get our engines back online soon.
We're heading to the station to fully recover, and drop off something for your help.
